subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jacques Rogge, the I.O.C. president, urged FIFA to follow the same tough approach against corruption in World Cup bidding as the Olympic body took after the Salt Lake City bribery scandal.
snippet: Jacques Rogge, the I.O.C. president, urged FIFA to follow the same tough approach against corruption in World Cup bidding as the Olympic body took after the Salt Lake City bribery scandal.
